extendedInfo.description: ComEdâs FREE mobile app allows customers to report their outage and check the restoration status right from their smartphone. Customers can also receive notifications as their outage status is updated and view the ComEd outage map for more details regarding their outage, such as the estimated time of restoration, crew status and probable cause of the outage.  In addition to the outage reporting functionality, customers can view their account summary and history, manage Budget Billing and automatic payments, report a meter reading, and find a payment location.  Customers will also be able to make a one-time payment through the app.  The app will make it easy to manage more than one account at a time; customers can access up to five residential accounts through the mobile app.

reviews.comment: Yet another crappy iOS port.

reviews.title: Emails as usernames
reviews.comment: All security pundits have been saying, and still are saying that using emails as usernames for logins (and using usernames anywhere else but for a username, i.e.; not a nickname everyone else can see!) is just about the dumbest practice anyone can hope to endeavour.
reviews.author: Dan Lo Fat

reviews.title: good for outages
reviews.comment: installed when we had an outage.  great for reporting and getting updates.  might be better to allow outage reporting without having to sign in.  and trust me - android apps look better when they\'re not trying to look like iPhone apps.

reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Very nice app, better than expected for this type of \"service\" app from a utility company.  Account History seems to hang.  Com Ed\'s app description says something about it allowing multiple accounts, but I am only able to add my main home account, and cannot find where to add another address, under the same account.
reviews.author: Tom Brandt

reviews.title: Great.
reviews.comment: No more sitting on hold with customer service or going thru digital menu. I downloaded and logged on within 15 minutes of my power being out and they already had an alert saying they were aware of the outage due to a vehicle accident and told me how many homes in my area were affected and when they anticipated power being back on. Now u can receive alerts and report outages with one button! Fantastic job comed!
reviews.author: Kristy Fujii
